You don't really get the point of mkvGOD's submissions, do you? The entire point of these rips is to have a smaller file size, so naturally, the video bitrate is going to be much smaller, and DTS, alone, is massive compared to AAC.

And to all you people complaining about the source, can you read? mkvGOD specifically wrote "WED-DL" source, so why are you upset that this isn't a BD rip? Christ almighty, you people are fucking stupid.
